price: Por certo, Allah é com os que são piedosos e com os que são benfeitores.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
